links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: a(n)=(1/64)*[1+9^n*(8*n-1)], with n>=1 [From _Paolo P. Lava_, Jan 13 2009]a(1)=1, a(2)=19, a(n) = 18*a(n-1) - 81*a(n-2) + 1. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 23 2012G.f.: x/((1 - x)*(1 - 9*x)^2). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 23 2012
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1, 19]; [n le 2 select I[n] else 18*Self(n-1) - 81*Self(n-2) + 1: n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 23 2012
